attributes.action: acknowledge that the laws in the UK are too lenient on all criminals and that ASBO's should be replaced by compulsory National Service for criminals in the hope of reforming these individuals for the better.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Crime is rife on our streets, people are being mugged, happy slapped, knifed, murdered etc and the law seems powerless against these criminals.  We feel that it is time to take them out of society, and with prisons over crowded it is felt that criminals, who have not comitted murder, should do a minimum three years National Service with an aim to reforming their characters and teaching them to have some respect for themselves as well as for others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
